Package breakout

Class BreakoutState

java.lang.Object
breakout.BreakoutState
public class BreakoutState extends Object
This class represents the state of the game

  • Constructor Details

    • BreakoutState

      public BreakoutState(breakout.BallState[] balls, breakout.BlockState[] blocks, breakout.Point bottomRight, breakout.PaddleState paddle)
      Initializes this BreakoutState with the given balls, blocks, bottomright and paddle.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if balls array is null. 
      balls == null
      IllegalArgumentException - if blocks array is null. 
      blocks == null
      IllegalArgumentException - if paddle is null. 
      paddle == null
      IllegalArgumentException - if bottomRight is null. 
      bottomRight == null
      Postconditions:
      This object's balls array equal the given balls array. 
      getBalls() == balls
      This object's blocks array equal the given blocks array. 
      getBlocks() == blocks
      This object's bottomRight equal the given bottomRight. 
      getBottomRight() == bottomRight
      This object's paddle equal the given paddle. 
      getPaddle() == paddle

      public breakout.Point getBottomRight()
      Returns this object's bottomRight

    • tick

      public void tick(int paddleDir)
      Orders the paddle based upon argument paddleDir to move left or right. For every ball in the balls array it: Moves the ball forward by its own velocity Checks for collissions with the field. And changes vectors accordingly should they collide to simulate bouncing. Deletes the ball and creates a new balls array without the ball if it hits the bottom. Checks for collisions with the Paddle and Blocks. And changes vectors accordingly should they collide to simulate bouncing. Increases the velocity in the X-component of the ball should the Paddle be hit Deletes the block and creates a new blocks array without the block if it hits the block.

    • movePaddleRight

      public void movePaddleRight()
      Moves the paddle right by 10 when allowed by wall
      Preconditions:
      Paddle is not null. 
      getPaddle().getCenter() != null
      Center is not null. 
      getPaddle().getCenter() != null
      Mutates:
      getPaddle()
      Postconditions:
      Paddle is not null. 
      getPaddle() != null
      Center is not null. 
      getPaddle().getCenter() != null
      the paddle cannot be right of the field 
      getPaddle().getCenter().getX() + getPaddle().getSize().getX()/2 <= getBottomRight().getX()

    • movePaddleLeft

      public void movePaddleLeft()
      Moves the paddle left by 10 when allowed by wall.
      Preconditions:
      Paddle is not null. 
      getPaddle().getCenter() != null
      Center is not null. 
      getPaddle().getCenter() != null
      Mutates:
      getPaddle()
      Postconditions:
      Paddle is not null. 
      getPaddle() != null
      Center is not null. 
      getPaddle().getCenter() != null
      the paddle cannot be left of the field 
      getPaddle().getCenter().getX() - getPaddle().getSize().getX()/2 >= 0

    • isWon

      public boolean isWon()
      Returns if the game is Won by having a ball and no more blocks.
      Inspects:
      getBlocks(), getBalls()
      Postconditions:
      You either have Won or have Not Won. 
      !(getBlocks().length == 0 && getBalls().length > 0) || result == true

    • isDead

      public boolean isDead()
      Returns if the player is dead by having no more balls.
      Inspects:
      getBalls()
      Postconditions:
      You either are Dead or are Not Dead. 
      !(getBalls().length == 0) || result == true
